champ_0010_chairman_01:
Muito bem, Campeã Nemona. Eu confio em você para
lidar com isto em meu lugar.[npcn:2C]
champ_0010_rival_00:
Claro! Pode contar comigo. Na verdade, aposto
que isso será divertido![npcn:4]
champ_0010_chairman_02: Fico feliz por ouvir isso. Bom dia. Então,[npcn:2C]
champ_0010_rival_16a:
Despertou seu interesse, né? Essa senhora é...
Bem, eles a chamam de La Primera!
Ela é forte, ela pode fazer praticamente qualquer
coisa, ela é legal praticamente saindo pelas orelhas...
Ela é basicamente tudo que eu quero ser - ou que
qualquer treinador Pokémon gostaria de ser, sério![npcn:4]
champ_0010_rival_16b:
Bom olho! Ela tem certeza! Essa senhora é... Bem, eles
chame-a de La Primera!
Ela é forte, ela pode fazer praticamente qualquer coisa,
ela é legal praticamente saindo pelas orelhas...
Ela é basicamente tudo que eu quero ser - ou que qualquer
treinador Pokémon gostaria de ser, sério![npcn:4]
champ_0010_rival_17:
Oh! Which reminds me! Remember in homeroom
when I asked what your dream is?[npcn:4]
champ_0010_rival_02a:
Now, I know you said you’re all about completing
the Pokédex! But hear me out...[npcn:4]
champ_0010_rival_02b:
Well, since your heart’s already set on becoming
a really strong Trainer...I’ve got an idea for you![npcn:4]
champ_0010_rival_02c:
If you’re still trying to decide what it is you’re
looking for...I’ve got an idea for you![npcn:4]
champ_0010_rival_03: You should try to reach [clr:6]Champion Rank[clr:0] like me![npcn:4]
champ_0010_rival_04a:
Oh wow! Hang on, though—I’ve got a whole spiel
I wanna give you. Here goes...[npcn:4]
champ_0010_rival_04b:
Aww, but talent like yours deserves to be used!
Hear me out...[npcn:4]
champ_0010_rival_05:
The Trainers who reach Champion Rank are the
ones who raise their Pokémon really strong.\c
They’re pro-tier battlers. Their moves keep
crowds absolutely on the edge of their seats![npcn:4]
champ_0010_rival_06:
You have to prove yourself to the Pokémon
League to officially get the title of Champion.[npcn:4]
champ_0010_rival_07:
And to do that, you have to do more than just
take classes here.\c
You’ve got to take on eight Pokémon Gyms and
win so you can collect their Gym Badges![npcn:4]
champ_0010_rival_08:
Once you’ve done all that, all that’s left is a
special test—the Champion Assessment.[npcn:4]
champ_0010_rival_09:
And once you pass THAT, then at long last you’ll
be a Champion![npcn:4]
champ_0010_rival_10:
It’s every Pokémon Trainer’s dream! The coolest
title anyone could ever hope to get!\c
Not to brag or anything![npcn:4]
champ_0010_rival_11:
I reached Champion Rank during our last
Treasure Hunt, you know![npcn:4]
champ_0010_rival_16:
Oh, the Treasure Hunt is a special independent
study thing we’ve got here. Should happen soon!\c
Our last one started not long after the beginning
of this school year![npcn:4]
champ_0010_rival_12:
It’s great! You get to leave school to go have an
adventure and learn however you want![npcn:4]
champ_0010_rival_13:
I guess you could say my journey to becoming
a Champion was the treasure I found...maybe?\r
I dunno yet if that’s the answer I’m looking for...[npcn:4]
champ_0010_rival_14:
Anyway, I’ve got a feeling I’d be able to get even
stronger if you and I were both working at it...[npcn:4]
champ_0010_rival_18:
Lemme go ahead and save the Gyms’ locations in
your map app in case you decide to go for it![npcn:4]
